name: @sounds.of.limbo/tooltip
description: Hover tooltip for React + MobX applications

scripts.build: npm run build:dist && npm run build:styles && git add . && git commit -m 'new build'
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm run pub_n_go
scripts.pub_n_go: npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags

author: Limbo Sounds
